mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, INFOR_AGR, ACT_AGR, M.MEM_NO, C.POS, CI.CORP_NO, CI.C_NAME, DEL_CHK, CI.C_BIZNO, CI.C_BOSS, CI.ADDR, CI.ADDR_DTL, CI.C_HPAGE, CI.ZIP, CI.CORP_IMG, SECTOR_NO, REGION_NO, RECRUIT_GBN, GRADU, MAJOR, CARR, PAY_GBN, PAY_LOW, PAY_HIGH, EMP_GBN, DLINE, DTL, REG_DATE, EMP_TITLE, CARR_Y, EMP_PER, EMP_DOC, EMP_PRCS, EMP_SAVNO, EMP_NO, CITY_NO FROM MEMBER M JOIN C_MEMBER C ON (M.MEM_NO = C.MEM_NO) JOIN C_INFO CI ON ( C.CORP_NO = CI.CORP_NO) JOIN EMP_ANNC ANC ON (ANC.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) AND EMP_NO = #{EMP_NO} AND DEL_CHK = 0
